td.content: s:a male pianist aged 34 Ys presents with moderate weakness, moderate weight loss over several months. he has history of moderate nausea. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in his past Patient does not smoke o:Height 69 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.
